pageContext.claim: “We also lowered the taxes on small businesses that pay their taxes through the individual returns, which was a very big deal and was actually very complex, very hard to get. And we got it. So the small business, we lowered the tax.”
pageContext.analysis: This isn't anything new. Individuals who are the sole proprietor of an LLC could always pay their taxes through their personal return. In fact, that is the only way that they could pay their taxes.
